subject: Boston Marathon
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: The four-time champion Bill Rodgers will run the Boston Marathon this year. Rodgers was given a bib with the number 79 to honor the 30th anniversary of his 1979 victory. Rodgers, 61, last completed the race in 1996, in just over 2 hours 53 minutes. It will be the 17th Boston Marathon for Rodgers, who had treatment for prostate cancer last year. He won the race in 1975, ’78, ’79 and ’80, twice setting the course record.
